verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>saith;<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H7378>contend<s%> thou <S%H854>before<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and let the <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye, O <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H7379>controversy,<s%> and ye <S%H386>strong<s%> <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he will <S%H3198>plead<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> unto thee? and <S%H4100>wherein<s%> have I <S%H3811>wearied<s%> thee? <S%H6030>testify<s%> against me.

For <S%H3588><s%> I brought thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> thee out of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam.<s%>

O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3289>consulted,<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H7851>Shittim<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Wherewith <S%H4100><s%> shall I come <S%H6923>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and bow <S%H3721>myself<s%> before the <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%> shall I come <S%H6923>before<s%> him with burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> with <S%H5695>calves<s%> of a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old?<s%>

Will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H352>rams,<s%> or with ten <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H5158>rivers<s%> of <S%H8081>oil?<s%> shall I <S%H5414>give<s%> my <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> for my <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of my <S%H990>body<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul?<s%>

He hath <S%H5046>showed<s%> thee, O <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> doth the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> thee, <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justly,<s%> and to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6800>humbly<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thy <S%H430>God?<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H7121>crieth<s%> unto the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the man of <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> ye the <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H3259>appointed<s%> it.

Are <S%H786>there<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and the <S%H7332>scant<s%> <S%H374>measure<s%> that is <S%H2194>abominable?<s%>
Shall I count them <S%H2135>pure<s%> with the <S%H7562>wicked<s%> <S%H3976>balances,<s%> and with the <S%H3599>bag<s%> of <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H68>weights?<s%>

For <S%H834><s%> the rich <S%H6223>men<s%> thereof are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2555>violence,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H8267>lies,<s%> and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Therefore <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H589>I<s%> make thee <S%H2470>sick<s%> in <S%H5221>smiting<s%> thee, in making thee <S%H8074>desolate<s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> thy <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> shalt <S%H398>eat,<s%> but <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7646>satisfied;<s%> and thy casting <S%H3445>down<s%> shall be in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee; and thou shalt take <S%H5253>hold,<s%> but shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6403>deliver;<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H6403>deliverest<s%> will I give <S%H5414>up<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> shalt <S%H2232>sow,<s%> but thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7114>reap;<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H1869>tread<s%> the <S%H2132>olives,<s%> but thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5480>anoint<s%> thee with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> and sweet <S%H8492>wine,<s%> but shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

For the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> are <S%H8104>kept,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> and ye <S%H1980>walk<s%> in their <S%H4156>counsels;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> I should <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof a <S%H8322>hissing:<s%> therefore ye shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>
